athOq pa~jcA$kSharA paq~gktiH pA~gktO# yaqj~jO yaqj~jamEqvAva# rundhEq pathyA(gg)# svaqstima#yajaqn prAcI#mEqva tayAq diSaqM prAjA#nannaqgninA# dakShiqNA sOmE#na praqtIcI(gm)# saviqtrOdI#cIq-madi#tyOqrddhvAM pathyA(gg)# svaqstiM  
~Mya#jatiq prAcI#mEqva tayAq diSaqM pra jA#nAtiq pathyA(gg)# svaqstimiqShTvA&gnIShOmau# yajatiq cakShu#ShIq vA EqtE yaqj~jasyaq yadaqgnIShOmauq tAByA#mEqvAnu# paSya - [  ] 35
